Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add missing Rentis streets, update-odonimio command, and CLAUDE.md data references

- Added 40 missing streets to rentis-streets.ts from geographic.org
- Created /update-odonimio slash command for bulk image-based data entry
- Updated CLAUDE.md to reference odonimio.ts, rentis-streets.ts, and nikaia-streets.ts as data sources

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
